message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be beneficial for both parties to collaborate. We are offering the product for $12000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10500. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Thank you for your response, Bob. After evaluating your proposal, we've decided to adjust our offer to $11000 for the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $10000?
